testcase.classname: F01_Register | users could use register functionality to open new accounts
testcase.name: user could register with valid fristname and lastname and email and password and confirmPassword
testcase.system-out: Given user go to register page..............................................passed When user lregister with valid fristname and lastname and email and password and confirmPassword.passed And user press on register button...........................................passed Then user register to the system successfully...............................passed And user logout to login page...............................................passed

testcase.classname: F02_Login | users could use login functionality to open their accounts
testcase.name: user could login with valid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed When user login with valid email and password...............................passed And user press on login button..............................................passed Then user login to the system successfully..................................passed

testcase.classname: F02_Search | users will be able to search for products with different parameters
testcase.name: user could search for product using fullname
testcase.system-out: Given user clicks on search field...........................................passed When user search with name of product.......................................passed Then user could find relative results.......................................passed

testcase.classname: F05_switch_between_currencies | Logged User could switch between currencies US-Euro
testcase.name: user could switch between currencies
testcase.system-out: Given user in home page.....................................................passed When user detierment to Euro................................................passed Then user switch between currencies US-Euro successfully....................passed
